name: easydict
title: Easy Dictionary
description: Easily look up words or translate text, support 48+ languages, support Linguee and Youdao dictionary, support OpenAI ChatGPT, DeepL, Google, Bing, Apple, Baidu, Tencent, Volcano, Youdao and Caiyun translation.
author: isfeng

commands.name: easydict
commands.title: Search Word
commands.subtitle: Easydict
commands.description: Automatically detect the input text language, and query preferred language dictionary or translate the text.

commands.name: ocr
commands.title: OCR Translate
commands.subtitle: Query text from image
commands.description: Screenshot OCR, and query text from image.

scripts.build-swift: swift build --configuration=release --arch arm64 --arch x86_64 && mv .build/apple/Products/Release/recognizeText assets

preferences.title: First Language
preferences.name: language1
preferences.description: Your first language

preferences.title: Second Language
preferences.name: language2
preferences.description: Your second language

preferences.title: Switch Boxes
preferences.name: enableAutomaticQuerySelectedText
preferences.label: Query Selected Text Automatically
preferences.description: Automatically query selected text from the frontmost application

preferences.name: showOpenInEudicFirst
preferences.label: Show Open in Eudic First
preferences.description: If enabled and Eudic is installed, `Open in Eudic` action will be shown in the first, otherwise `Copy Text` will be shown.

preferences.name: enableDetectLanguageSpeedFirst
preferences.label: Detect Language Speed First
preferences.description: Turned on by default, the speed and accuracy of language detection is well balanced. Turn off if you want more accurate language detection, but slower ⚠️ .

preferences.name: enableAutomaticPlayWordAudio
preferences.label: Play Word Pronunciation Automatically
preferences.description: Automatically play word pronunciation after looking up a `English` word

preferences.name: enableSelectTargetLanguage
preferences.label: Show Select Target Language
preferences.description: If you need to select target language manually, turn on it.

preferences.name: enableSystemProxy
preferences.label: Use System Proxy
preferences.description: ⚠️ Note that it should only be enabled if needed, as it can slow down requests.

preferences.title: Apple System Features
preferences.name: enableAppleTranslate
preferences.label: Apple Translate
preferences.description: ⚠️ An `Apple Translate` shortcut needs to be installed, please see README for more details.

preferences.name: enableAppleLanguageDetect
preferences.label: Apple Language Detect
preferences.description: ⚠️ An `Apple Language Detect` shortcut needs to be installed, please see README for more details.

preferences.title: Dictionary Services
preferences.name: enableYoudaoDictionary
preferences.label: Youdao Dictionary
preferences.description: Support 5 languages: (Chinese), English, French, Japanese, Korean.

preferences.name: enableLingueeDictionary
preferences.label: Linguee Dictionary
preferences.description: Support 19 languages: (Chinese, Japanese, Russian), English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, German, Swedish, Romanian, Slovak, Dutch, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Finnish, Polish, Czech.
